titles.title: Open The Eyes Of My Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Open the eyes of my heart,
Lord, open the eyes of my heart.
I want to see You.
I want to see You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Open the eyes of my heart,
Lord, open the eyes of my heart.
I want to see You.
I want to see You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
To see You high and lifted up,
Shining in the light of Your glory.
Pour out your power and love
As we sing holy, holy, holy.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy,
I want to see You.
